[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@rushstack/debug-certificate-manager](./debug-certificate-manager.md) &gt; [ICertificateStoreOptions](./debug-certificate-manager.icertificatestoreoptions.md) &gt; [storePath](./debug-certificate-manager.icertificatestoreoptions.storepath.md)

## ICertificateStoreOptions.storePath property

Path to the directory where the certificate store will be created. If not provided, it defaults to `<homedir>/.rushstack`<></>.

**Signature:**

```typescript
storePath?: string;
```
